data.name: Trans-Siberian Railway Simulator
data.detailed_description:
ADD TO WISHLIST

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1422130/SimRail_2021__The_Railway_Simulator/


About the Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1263620/Yacht_Mechanic_Simulator/

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1982080/Animal_Shelter__Puppies__Kittens_DLC/

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1151980/Magnet_Fishing_Simulator/


Get behind the wheels of classic Russian locomotive, explore the raw beauty and wildness of Siberia and try to survive in the longest railway line in the world.
This is Trans-Siberian Railway Simulator. A game for true survivors!



Check if the wild animals, bad people, severe frosts and constantly changing weather are able to stop you. Learn how to be a real man!



Trans-Siberian Railway Simulator brings to life some amazing train and survival challenges on real Russian dangerous routes. Feel what it's like to put your hands on the controls of powerful freight locomotive and explore untouched natural landscape that will leave you in awe.

Key features:

  • Detailed VL10 locomotive driving simulation
  • Locomotive repairing system
  • Railway traffic simulation
  • Survival and Simulator game modes.
  • Survival system with hunger, thirst, alcohol, hangover, illness and hypothermia stats.
  • Shooting system
  • Hunting system
  • Shopping and selling system
  • Locomotive inspection mode
  • Dynamic weather system with day/night cycle
  • Route from Novosibirsk to Krasnoyarsk

  • Random legal and illegal paying jobs - TBD
  • Mafia system - TBD

data.short_description: Get behind the wheels of classic Russian locomotive and check if the wild animals, bad people, severe frosts and constantly changing weather are able to stop you. Try to survive in the longest railway line in the world!
data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, Polish*, Russian*, French*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese*, Italian, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 1
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 1
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 3770 3.4 GHz / AMD CPU AMD FX-8350 4 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 770 / AMD GPU Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
